price: 41. Ir klausyk Dieną, kuomet bus pašaukta iš artimos vietos.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
